message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and discourse structure. Additionally, the use of a neural network and attention mechanism suggests a focus on machine learning and artificial intelligence, which are also relevant to the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper's application to text categorization suggests a connection to the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval), while the use of a recursive neural network suggests a connection to the sub-category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
